Package ohos.agp.window.service

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.service.Window

  • public class Window
extends Object
    An implementation class for windows.

    This class provides methods of modifying attributes of windows based on LayoutConfig.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  Window.IAccessibilityEventListener
      An implementation class for Populate Accessibility Event Listener.

    • Constructor Summary

      A constructor used to create a Window instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Window

        public Window​()
        A constructor used to create a Window instance.

        This method can also be used for tests.

    • Method Detail

      • isMovable

        public boolean isMovable​()
        Checks whether a window is movable.
        Returns:
        Returns True if the window is movable; returns false otherwise.

      • setMovable

        public void setMovable​(boolean movable)
        Sets whether a window is movable.
        Parameters:
        movable - Indicates whether the window is movable. True indicates movable; false indicates otherwise.

      • getBoundRect

        public Rect getBoundRect​()
        Obtains the bounds of a moving window.
        Returns:
        Returns the rectangular bounds of the window.

      • setBoundRect

        public void setBoundRect​(Rect boundRect)
        Sets the bounds of a moving window.
        Parameters:
        boundRect - Indicates the rectangular bounds of the window.

      • getLayoutConfig

        public Optional<WindowManager.LayoutConfig> getLayoutConfig​()
        Obtains the LayoutConfig object of the Window instance to read or modify.
        Returns:
        Returns the current WindowManager.LayoutConfig attributes of the Window instance.

      • setLayoutConfig

        public void setLayoutConfig​(WindowManager.LayoutConfig param)
        Sets the LayoutConfig of the Window instance.
        Parameters:
        param - Indicates the parameters to pass to this method. You can obtain the LayoutConfig parameters from the getLayoutConfig() method.

      • setLayoutAlignment

        public void setLayoutAlignment​(int alignment)
        Sets the text alignment for a window.

        You can obtain the supported attributes from TextAlignment.

        • HORIZONTAL_CENTER
        • VERTICAL_CENTER
        Parameters:
        alignment - Indicates the alignment attribute to set for the window.
        Since:
        4

      • addFlags

        public void addFlags​(int flags)
        Adds window flags. You can obtain the currently supported flags from WindowManager.LayoutConfig.
        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the flags to set add.

      • clearFlags

        public void clearFlags​(int flags)
        Clears flags from a window.
        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the flags to be cleared from the window.

      • setLayoutFlags

        public void setLayoutFlags​(int flags,
                           int mask)
        Sets flags for a window.

        Different from the addFlags(int flags) method, this method clears the existing flags using the attrs.flag &~ mask calculation and then sets new flags.

        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the new flags specified by .LayoutConfig.
        mask - Indicates the mask of the window.

      • setWindowLayout

        public void setWindowLayout​(int width,
                            int height)
        Sets the size of a window.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width of the window.
        height - Indicates the height of the window.

      • setNavigationBarColor

        public void setNavigationBarColor​(int color)
        Sets the color of a navigation bar.
        Parameters:
        color - Indicates the color of the navigation bar.

      • setStatusBarColor

        public void setStatusBarColor​(int color)
        Sets the color of the status bar.
        Parameters:
        color - Indicates the color of the status bar.

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding​(int left,
                       int top,
                       int right,
                       int bottom)
        Sets the inner padding of a window in the sequence of left, top, right, and bottom.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the left padding.
        top - Indicates the top padding.
        right - Indicates the right padding.
        bottom - Indicates the bottom padding.

      • setStatusBarVisibility

        public void setStatusBarVisibility​(int visibility)
        Sets whether the status bar is visible. Component.INVISIBLE indicates the status bar is invisible.
        Parameters:
        visibility - Indicates whether the status bar is visible. Component.VISIBLE indicates visible; Component.INVISIBLE indicates invisible.

      • getStatusBarVisibility

        public int getStatusBarVisibility​()
        Obtains whether the status bar is visible. Component.INVISIBLE indicates the status bar is invisible.
        Returns:
        Returns Component.VISIBLE if the status bar is visible; Returns Component.INVISIBLE if the status bar is invisible.

      • getCurrentComponentFocus

        public Optional<Component> getCurrentComponentFocus​()
        Obtains the Component object that has gained focus in this window.
        Returns:
        Returns the Component object that has gained focus in this window.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor​(RgbColor rgbColor)
        Sets the background color of a window.
        Parameters:
        rgbColor - Indicates the value of the color for the window.
        Since:
        4

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground​(String elementPath)
        Sets the background for a window.
        Parameters:
        elementPath - Indicates the path of background resources for the window.

      • addWindowFlags

        public void addWindowFlags​(int flags)
        Sets the characteristic flags of a window in ohos. You can obtain supported flags from WindowManager.LayoutConfig.
        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the value of the flags to set for the window.

      • clearWindowFlags

        public void clearWindowFlags​(int flags)
        Clears the flags from a window.
        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the window flags to be cleared.

      • setWindowFlags

        public void setWindowFlags​(int flags,
                           int mask)
        Sets window flags.
        Parameters:
        flags - Indicates the window flags to set.
        mask - Indicates the mask to set.

      • setTransparent

        public void setTransparent​(boolean isEnable)
        Sets whether to enable transparency.
        Parameters:
        isEnable - Specifies whether transparency is enabled. True indicates that transparency is enabled, and False indicates disabled.

      • setOnApplyComponentPaddingListener

        public void setOnApplyComponentPaddingListener​(IApplyComponentPaddingListener listener)
        Sets a listener to monitor ComponentPadding changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the IApplyComponentInsetsListener object, which represents the listener to set.
        Since:
        5

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive​()
        Checks whether this window is active.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this window is active; returns false otherwise.
        Since:

      • isWCGMode

        public boolean isWCGMode​()
        Checks whether this window is in wide color gamut (WCG) mode.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this window is in WCG mode; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • setPixelFormat

        public void setPixelFormat​(int format)
        Sets the pixel format for this window.
        Parameters:
        format - Indicates the pixel format to set.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_YCBCR_422_I, Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_YCRCB_420_SP, Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_YV12

      • replicateFrom

        public int replicateFrom​(WindowManager.LayoutConfig param)
        Sets a layout attribute for this window.
        Parameters:
        layoutConfig - Indicates the layout attribute to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the changed attributes, as described in WindowManager.LayoutConfig#ALTER_LAYOUT.
        Since:
        5

      • setLayoutInDisplaySideMode

        public void setLayoutInDisplaySideMode​(int mode)
        Sets the display mode for the sidebar of this Window. This method applies to smartphones with a super curved screen.
        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the display mode to set. The value can be WindowManager.LayoutConfig#LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_DEFAULT, WindowManager.LayoutConfig#LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_ALWAYS, or WindowManager.LayoutConfig#LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_NEVER.
        Since:
        5

      • setAccessibilityEventListener

        public void setAccessibilityEventListener​(Window.IAccessibilityEventListener pListener)
        set the Populate Accessibility Event Listener for window
        Parameters:
        pListener - The Populate Accessibility Event.

      • setInputPanelDisplayType

        public void setInputPanelDisplayType​(int type)
        Set input panel display type for window.
        Parameters:
        type - The input panel display type.
        Since:
        4
